subject: Re: heretical thoughts was Re: Speakup dropped from Ubuntu
body: 144 (return) [ Gutherius (de Officiis Domžs August¾, l. ii. c. 20, l. iii.) has very accurately explained the functions of the master of the offices, and the constitution of the subordinate _scrinia_. But he vainly attempts, on the most doubtful authority, to deduce from the time of the Antonines, or even of Nero, the origin of a magistrate who cannot be found in history before the reign of Constantine.]
